objects.name: PuzzleExit
objects.string: R - G - B - B - G - R

eventsFunctions.description: Check the next note of the provided Birdsong puzzle. (Must have "Notes" and Index" variables.) (Result is sent to global SongNote variable.)
eventsFunctions.name: AdvNextNote

eventsFunctions.description: Check the next note of the provided Birdsong puzzle. (Must have "Notes", Index", and "Solved" variables.) (Result is sent to global SongNote variable.)
eventsFunctions.name: CheckNextNote
